title: Interprofessional Collaborative Simulation Education Program for Healthcare Professionals

context.prior_knowledge: Basic medical knowledge and core competencies by specialization
context.additional_context: Short-term intensive program conducted in a mixed environment for students from various medical-related departments (medicine, nursing, physical therapy, etc.)

learning_goals: Clearly understand and explain the roles and responsibilities of other professional groups through real clinical scenarios
Apply effective communication and collaboration strategies among professionals through interdependent task performance in VR simulation environments
Evaluate collaborative problem-solving skills in interprofessional conflict situations based on role-immersion experiences
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
